parameters.name: numstim
parameters.description: Number of stimuli in a trial

parameters.name: ytrans
parameters.description: Y translation for learning trials.  only considers negative and positive values.

parameters.name: xtrans
parameters.description: X translation for learning trials.  only considers negative and positive values.

parameters.name: mintime
parameters.description: Minimum time limit for hitting target

parameters.name: spreadtime
parameters.description: size of uniform distribution range for time limit.
